api_list.name: Get Products
api_list.description: Endpoint to get all products you have made via Make Products
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://loyalty-apis.p.rapidapi.com/products"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "loyalty-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
